name: plenteously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in large amounts: She was no longer able to hold back her tears, and soon they were flowing plenteously down her cheeks. We deserve so little, and yet we have been plenteously provided with good things.
More examplesFewer examplesLet us thank our God for giving us his peace most plenteously.Tears ran down his cheeks plenteously when he thought of all the misery that was coming for his people.How plenteously have the blessings of God been given to this family.
